import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { GLOBAL } from 'src/app/core/config/GLOBAL'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators, FormControl } from "@angular/forms"; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/core/auth/auth.service'; import { ToastService } from 'src/app/shared/services/toast.service'; import { ProfileData } from 'src/app/core/model/profile-data'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent { updateForm!: FormGroup; public user: any = { data: {} }; submitted = false; constructor( private _formBuilder: FormBuilder, private _authService: AuthService, private _router: Router, private _toastService: ToastService ) { this.updateForm = this._formBuilder.group({ userName:['', [Validators.required]], firstName:['', [Validators.required]], lastName:['', [Validators.required]], email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], location:['', [Validators.required]], phoneNumber:['', [Validators.required]], role:['', [Validators.required]], identification:['', [Validators.required]], additionalInfo:['', [Validators.required]], profileImage:['', [Validators.required]], }); } get f() { return this.updateForm.controls; } ngOnInit(): void { this.fetchUserData(); } fetchUserData() { this._authService.get_admin().subscribe( response => { this.user = response; console.log("ðŸš€ ~ file: profile.component.ts:48 ~ ProfileComponent ~ fetchUserData ~ this.user:", this.user) if (response.data === undefined) { this._router.navigate(['']); } else { const { userName, firstName, lastName, email, location, phoneNumber, role, identification, additionalInfo, profileImage, createdAt, updatedAt } = response.data; this.updateForm.patchValue({ userName: userName, firstName: firstName, lastName: lastName, email: email, location: location, phoneNumber: phoneNumber, role: role, identification: identification, additionalInfo: additionalInfo, profileImage: profileImage, createdAt: createdAt, updatedAt: updatedAt, }); } }, error => { console.error(error); } ); } update() { this.submitted = true; } }
